experience: You and Shaun both know Xavier Musy, Jamie Vaccaro Harris, and 20 others
Shaun started at Swiftpage 3 years and 11 months before you did

Collaborate with various business areas to identify, develop and deliver actionable data reports to the perspective departments. Due to sudden staffing changes, acquired the IT Engineer role in addition to BIA. •	Created and manage the internal SSRS reporting server and converted existing Microsoft Excel reports into SSRS reports.•	Generate detailed reports for the leadership team including units under management, sales commission report, revenue by channel and service-level agreement (SLA) reports. •	Utilize data from multiple billing systems to generate an overall status report of the business.•	Import data into SQL and modify the data to meet each individual report’s business requirements. •	Create SQL procedures that modifies the data in the database and establish SQL views that assist in combining the data between the multiple billing systems.•	Sole admin of the internal CRM, Saleslogix. Perform daily SQL update and import queries against the production database to ensure that data is correctly aligned for sales and support departments.•	Responsible for maintaining existing internal business systems. Including, managing the integrations that interact with Saleslogix. •	Manage the manual internal integration between Netsuite, Zuora and Eloqua to Saleslogix.•	Create SQL views in the Saleslogix production database that audit the data to ensure the integrity of the data created by third party applications is accurate. •	Monitor and resolve IT tickets.
Customer Support Analyst I / II and Senior Support Analyst

Provided technical support to external and internal customers for the Act! product family, including the on-premise and hosted line.•	Managed Act! Premium Hosted escalations and on-boarding process. This includes coordinating with Phone Fusion to ensure proper deployment.•	Monitored Act! Certified Consultant product defect submission message board. Verify legitimacy by testing, then coordinate with applicable departments to warrant a solution. •	Provided Help Desk support to internal customers on a many-to-one basis to efficiently resolute complex issues.

Initiated outbound calls to cliental in regards to account sensitive information. Outbound tasks varied daily. Built rapport with new and existing customers by ensuring they had the products and/or services needed to accomplish their online goals. •	Outbound tasks primarily included; reaching out to our new cliental, renewal appreciation, and failed billing. •	Took part in special outbound assignments reaching out to criteria met specified customers to upsell certain products and/or services.•	Created a training plan for the department’s hosting ad-hoc campaign for new hires, this includes call flow and QA.
Inbound Customer Service and Sales Representative

Provided inbound technical support for GoDaddy products including domain, hosting and email services. Repaired and/or built customer loyalty by keeping a positive attitude and maintaining consistent delight throughout. Upsold on every applicable call.
